short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension which convert screenshots to React tailwind code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless UI Translation:
Transform screenshots into React Tailwind code seamlessly, streamlining the development process.

Intuitive Integration:
User-friendly extension that seamlessly integrates with your workflow for instant code generation.

Accelerate Development:
Boost productivity by converting visual designs into React Tailwind components in a fraction of the time.

Visual Learning Aid:
Learn and understand UI development through a visual translation of design elements to code.

Tailwind CSS Ready:
Tailored for Tailwind CSS, ensuring generated code aligns with the popular utility-first framework.
